K12D0601=D0884_H0557:309a-1: sarba ma n'anta mi ta siddhi tsee tya n'a ma dh'a ra n'i /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:309a-3: shes pa thams cad mthar phyin par grub pa'i mchod rten zhes bya ba'i gzungs /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:309a-4: dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:309a-5: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:309a-6: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:309a-7: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos thams cad
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:309a-9: rnam par 'phrul pa'i gzi brjid kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:309a-10: phyag 'tshal dus gsum sangs rgyas la //
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:309a-11: phyag 'tshal dkon mchog gsum dge la //
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:309a-13: spyan ras gzigs la bdag phyag 'tshal; ;rigs gsum la yang phyag 'tshal lo //
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:309a-14: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:309a-15: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po ri rab chen po sna lngas grub pa /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:309a-16: gzhi nyid mchod rten gyi rang bzhin du gnas pa'i
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:309a-17: steng na rin po che sna tshogs pa'i khang pa
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:309a-18: dang / tshad med pa'i mchod rten bzhi dang /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:309a-19: rang bzhin gyi mchod rten chen po gnas yin pa'i
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:309a-20: phyir rtse mo'i dbyings kyang mchod rten du gyur pa'i
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:309a-21: gnas na lag na rdo rje dang /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:309b-0: byams pa la sogs pas @309b bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:309b-3: rgyal po chen po bzhi la sogs pa gtsang ris
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:309b-4: kyi mgon po rnams dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:309b-5: // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi gtsug tor dang /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:309b-6: thugs ka'i dpal be'u la sogs pa rnams nas 'od
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:309b-7: zer kha dog rnam pa sna tshogs pa bye ba
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:309b-8: khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu snyed cig bkye ste;
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:309b-9: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:309b-10: grangs med pa bsam gyis mi khyab cing brjod kyis
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:309b-11: mi lang ba thams cad 'od zer gyi snang ba
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:309b-12: chen pos til gyi gang bu bzhin du gang zhing
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:309b-13: khyab par mdzad pas mtha' yas pa'i sems can thams
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:309b-14: cad long ba rnams kyis gzugs mthong ba dang /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:309b-15: 'on pa rnams kyis sgra thos pa dang /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:309b-16: dig pa rnams smra shes pa dang /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:309b-20: nad pa rnams nad dang bral ba dang /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:309b-21: dmyal ba rnams tshe phri nas rim gyis sdug bsngal las thar pa dang /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:309b-22: gzhan yang 'gro ba sems can rnams rim gyis dran
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:309b-23: pa rnyed par byas nas nam mkha'i khams thams cad
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:309b-24: yid kyi mchod rten gyi skus gang zhing rgyas par
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:309b-25: byas te 'od zer de dag slar bcom ldan 'das
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:309b-26: kyi dbu'i gtsug tu 'dus pa las chos kyi sku'i
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:310a-0: de nas lag na rdo rje la sogs pa'i 'khor @310a *//
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:310a-1: rnams ngo mtshar du gyur nas bcom ldan 'das la bla re dang /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:310a-14: rol mo la sogs pa'i mchod pa rnams kyis mchod
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:310a-15: nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:310a-16: // bcom ldan 'das 'gro ba'i mgon po thugs rje
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:310a-17: chen po dang ldan pas mchod rten byin gyis brlab
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:310a-18: pa'i cho ga rig pa chen mo bi ma la
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:310a-19: aushn'i sha'i gzungs bshad du gsol /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:310a-20: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:310a-21: mchod rten byin gyis brlab pa'i cho ga rig pa
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:310a-22: chen mo bi ma la aushn'i sha'i gzungs 'di ni;
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:310a-23: rigs kyi bu'am / rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis 'dzin tam /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:310a-28: de mtshams med pa lnga dang /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:310a-30: sdig pa'i las ci byas pa thams cad ma lus par byang bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:310a-31: bi ma la aushn'i sha'i rig pa chen mo'i mchod
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:310a-32: rten byin gyis brlab pa'i cho ga 'di'o; ;aom tre
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:310a-33: dhva sarba ta th'a ga ta hri da ya garbhe
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:310a-34: / dzva la dharma dha tu garbha /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:310a-35: sam ha ra na aa yu:sam sho dha ya /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:310a-36: p'a pam sarba ta th'a ga t'a sa manta aushn'i sha bi ma la bi shuddhe sv'ah'a /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:310b-0: rig pa chen @310b mo 'di gsungs ma thag tu
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:310b-1: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad mchod rten gyi rang
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:310b-3: rig pa chen mo 'di gro ga'am /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:310b-5: shing shun la bris te rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags na /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:310b-6: lha dang mi la sogs pa thams cad kyis mchod cing phyag bya ba dang /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:310b-7: bkur sti bya ba'i 'os su 'gyur ro //
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:310b-8: rig pa chen mo 'di lus sam mgul du thogs na /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:310b-11: lha ma yin la sogs pa rnams kyis sangs rgyas nyid du lta bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:310b-15: sa phyogs gang du 'gro ba'i tshe rig pa chen mo 'di brjod na /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:310b-16: ri dang sa phyogs thams cad mchod rten dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:310b-17: aom tre dhe sarba ta th'a ga ta hri da ya garbhe /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:310b-18: dzva la dharma dh'a tu garbhe /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:310b-19: sam ha ra na a'a yu:sam sho dha ya /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:310b-20: p'a pam sarba ta th'a ga ta sa manta aushn'i sha bi ma la bi shuddhe /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:310b-21: ma h'a bi ra dze ra gam bhi ra si /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:310b-23: bi bi sa ra aa aa lam sv'ah'a /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:310b-25: sa gzhi thams cad kyang mchod rten gyi rang bzhin du 'gyur ro //
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:310b-28: rgya mtsho la sogs pa gang la rgal ba na yang rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'dis btab na /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:310b-29: chu de thams cad kyang mchod rten gyi rang bzhin du 'gyur ro //
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:310b-30: aom stree ya dhe sarba ta th'a ga ta hri da ya garbhe /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:310b-31: dzva la dharma dh'a tu garbhe /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:311a-0: sam ha ra na a'a yu sam sho dha @311a *//
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:311a-1: ya; p'a pam sarba ta th'a ga ta sa manta bi ma le aushn'i sha bi shuddhe /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:311a-2: ma h'a bi ra dze ra gam bhi ra si /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:311a-3: dharma dh'a tu bi bi sa ra aa ma ma ki sv'ah'a /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:311a-5: chu thams cad kyang mchod rten gyi rang bzhin du 'gyur ro //
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:311a-6: gzhan yang bdag nyid kyis nam mkha' gang nas gang
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:311a-7: khyab par rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'di btab na
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:311a-8: / nam mkha' thams cad kyang mchod rten gyi rten gyi rang bzhin du 'gyur ro //
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:311a-9: aom stree ya dhe sarba ta th'a ga ta hri da ya garbhe /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:311a-10: dzva la dharma dh'a tu garbhe /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:311a-11: sam ha ra na a'a yu:sam sho dha ya /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:311a-12: b'a bam sarba ta th'a ga ta sa manta /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:311a-13: bi ma le aushn'i sha bi shuddhe /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:311a-14: ma h'a ma bi ra dze ra gam bh'i ra si /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:311a-15: dharma dh'a tu bi bi sa ra aa aa aae kham ya sv'ah'a /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:311a-17: nam mkha'i khams thams cad mchod rten gyi rang bzhin du 'gyur te /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:311a-20: mchod par bya ba'i 'os su 'gyur ro //
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:311a-21: bi ma la aushni sha'i gzungs bzlas te 'byung ba
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:311a-22: chen po lnga po gang la yang mchod rten btab
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:311a-24: sgrib pa thams cad dag par 'gyur ro //
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:311a-29: 'bi 'bi gang yang rung ba la rig pa'i sngags 'dis btab ste mchod rten btab na /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:311a-30: rin po che sna tshogs kyi mchod rten gyi rgyur 'gyur te /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:311b-0: aom ratna tsee tye panytsa ye bi bi sa @311b ra sv'ah'a /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:311b-1: zhes brjod nas ba'i lci ba la sogs pas byugs na /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:311b-2: thams cad rin po che'i mchod rten gyi rgyur 'gyur ro //
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:311b-3: rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'di ma btab na /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:311b-4: gang zhig gser dang dngul dang bee d'urya la sogs
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:311b-5: pa rin po che sna bdun las mchod rten bzhengs
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:311b-10: de ni; 'di nyid rdzas kyi rang bzhin las snying
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:311b-11: po dang gsang sngags byin gyi rlabs ma bzhugs pa'i
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:311b-12: phyir rig pa chen mo 'dis byin gyis brlabs te
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:311b-13: btab na / 'byung ba chen po gang la mchod
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:311b-14: rten btab kyang bskal pa dpag tu med pa thams
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:311b-15: cad kyi sgrib pa'i dri ma dag nas khyim bdag
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:311b-16: gi rigs shing s'a la chen po lta bur skyes
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:311b-17: nas phyir mi ldog pa'i sa thob par 'gyur ro
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:311b-18: btab na / // rig pa chen mo 'dis byin gyis brlabs te rdo dang /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:311b-19: shing leb la sogs pa la mchod rten btab na /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:311b-20: de gdon mi za bar bram ze'i rigs shing s'a
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:311b-21: la chen po lta bur skyes nas sa bcu rim
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:311b-22: gyis bgrod de bcu gcig kun tu 'od kyi sa
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:311b-24: rig pa chen mo 'dis byin gyis brlabs te gser dang /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:311b-26: bee d'urya la sogs pa la mchod rten btab na /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:311b-27: de gdon mi za bar rgyal rigs shing s'a la
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:311b-28: chen po lta bur skyes nas rdo rje 'dzin pa'i
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:312a-0: gzhan yang rig pa chen mo'i @312a *//
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:312a-2: mchod rten gcig btab na yang bye ba btab par 'gyur ro //
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:312a-3: rig pa chen mo 'dis ma btab na /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:312a-4: bye ba btab kyang gcig dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:312a-7: rig pa chen mo de'i sngags 'di yin te /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:312a-14: aa dhishtha na aa dhi shthi te /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:312a-18: 'jim pa'i gong bu la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas te mchod rten gcig btab na /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:312a-20: brgya btab pa'i grangs dang phan yon ni /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:312a-21: 'phags pa nyan thos kyi dgra bcom pa rnams kyis kyang brjod par mi nus so //
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:312a-22: stong btab pa'i grangs dang phan yon ni; byang chub
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:312a-23: sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang brjod par mi nus so
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:312a-24: // khri btab pa'i grangs dang phan yon ni /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:312a-25: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang brjod par mi
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:312a-26: nus so; ;'bum btab pa'i grangs dang phan yon ni
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:312a-27: / phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang brjod par mi nus so //
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:312a-28: de bas na mchod pa'i rten lnga man chad gdab pa'i mchod pa'i cho gar bya ba ni /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:312a-29: thog mar mchod rten brtsig pa'i gnas sam /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:312a-30: mchod rten gyi 'jim pa'i gnas sam /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:312b-0: mchod rten gyi 'jim pa'i @312b gnas gang nas blangs
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:312b-1: pa'i gnas de sa bdag byin gyis brlab cing sa
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:312b-2: la gnas pa'i gdon bgegs bsam sbyor ngan pa mchod
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:312b-3: rten dang / dge ba la bar chad byed pa rnams mtshams gcad par bya ste /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:312b-4: thig skud la rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'dis gdab ste /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:312b-5: aom badzra s'u tra h'um phat/
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:312b-6: ces brjod nas thig skud de nyid rdo rje'i skud
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:312b-7: par dmigs nas mchod rten gyi sa khyon ji tsam
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:312b-8: rnam pa dang / 'jim pa'i sa khyon ji tsam rnam pa thig gis sa bcad /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:312b-9: de bzhin du sa bcad na /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:312b-10: sa gzhi de nyid mchod rten gyi rgyu rin po
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:312b-11: che rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang 'dra bar 'gyur
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:312b-12: ro // de nas sa de nyid la seng ldeng
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:312b-13: gi phur ba sor brgyad pa la rig pa chen
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:312b-14: mo'i sngags 'di gdab par bya ste /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:312b-15: aom badzra k'i li k'i li k'i la ya sarba dushtam h'um phat/
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:312b-16: ces bya ba 'di lan bdun bzlas te rdo rje
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:312b-17: phur bus dmigs te dbus dang gra bzhir gdab bo
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:312b-19: mi dang mi ma yin pa las srung bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:312b-20: sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ni /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:312b-22: seng ldeng gi phur bu ni /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:312b-23: mchod rten gyi 'jim pa'i sa ji tsam dgos pa
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:312b-24: ma blangs kyi bar du mi dbyung bar gzhag go
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:312b-25: / de nas til dang yungs kar la rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'di brjod par bya'o //
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:312b-26: aom aa mri te ha na ha na h'um phat/
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:313a-0: ces lan bdun bzlas te sa'i phyogs su gtor @313a *//
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:313a-1: bas; sa phyogs de nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i bzhugs gnas dpag tu med par 'gyur /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:313a-2: de ltar sa gzhi de bzhin gshegs pa'i bzhugs gnas su byin gyis brlab ste /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:313a-3: bgegs kyi bsam sbyor ngan pa las mtshams bcad de spos dang /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:313a-5: gtor ma la sogs pa rnams kyis kyang sa phyogs de na gnas pa'i lha dang /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:313a-7: lha ma yin la sogs pa rnams la mchod cing
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:313a-8: bsngos te bi ma la aushn'i sha'i gzungs 'di bklags
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:313a-9: na / sa phyogs de yang shin tu bkra shis shing byin chags par 'gyur ro //
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:313a-10: de nas mchod rten gyi 'jim pa'i sa brko ba'i
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:313a-11: tshe rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'di bzlas te brko
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:313a-12: bar bya'o // aom badzra kha na kha na h'um phat/
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:313a-13: ces bzlas shing sa gzhi de nyid rin po che sna lngar gyur par dmigs te brkos na /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:313a-14: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnam par dag pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro //
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:313a-15: de nas sa gtsang ma blangs pa de dag gnas
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:313a-16: gtsang ma zhig tu bzhag nas sa brdung ba'i cho
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:313a-17: ga ni / tho ba la bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'i
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:313a-18: phyag rgya rdo rje rtse gsum pas mnan te rig
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:313a-19: pa chen mo'i sngags 'dis btab ste brdung ngo //
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:313a-20: badzra mud ga ra a'a ko ta ya a'a ko ta ya h'um phat/
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:313a-21: ces lan bdun bzlas te rdo rje'i tho bar dmigs shing brdungs na /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:313b-0: nyon mongs pa dang bag @313b chags thams cad ma lus par byang zhing bcom par 'gyur ro //
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:313b-1: de nas 'jim pa bdzi ba ni /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:313b-2: spos chab la bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'i phyag rgyas gtugs
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:313b-3: te sbos chu de'i nang du yang chos nyid kyi
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:313b-4: yi ge aa zhe bya ba dkar po las zla
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:313b-5: ba'i dkyil 'khor 'od dang chas par dmigs te zla
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:313b-6: ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'od zer chen po des spos
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:313b-7: chu de khyab par gyur nas spos chu nyid bdud
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:313b-8: rtsi'i rang bzhin du gyur par dmigs nas rig pa
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:313b-9: chen mo'i sngags 'di brjod par bya'o //
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:313b-10: aom aa mri te h'um phat/
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:313b-11: ces bya ba lan bdun bzlas te byin gyis brlabs pas /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:313b-12: de nyid kyang bdud rtsi chen po'i chu rgyun dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:313b-13: de nas 'jim pa brdzi ba'i sngags chen mo 'di brjod par bya'o //
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:313b-14: aom badzra pra marda n'a ya h'um phat/
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:313b-16: 'jim pa de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa'i skur 'gyur ro //
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:313b-17: de nas 'jim pa de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa'i
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:313b-18: sku bsam gyis mi khyab par byin gyis brlab pa
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:313b-19: ni / 'jim pa de nyid la bdud rtsi 'khyil
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:313b-20: ba'i phyag rgya bcings te rig pa chen mo'i gzungs
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:313b-22: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:313b-27: ya sho ya sho ba ti te dzo shuddhe bi shudehe /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:313b-29: aa dhishtha na aa dheshthi te /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:313b-30: aa na mo te hi ti sv'ah'a /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:314a-0: zhe bdag nyid kyi rig pa chen mo 'di lan @314a */
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:314a-1: bdun gsum du nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'di sbyin gyis brlabs na /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:314a-2: 'jim pa nyid las ye shes kyi 'od zer rnam lnga phyogs bcur 'phros par 'gyur ro //
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:314a-3: phyogs bcur 'phros nas kyang sems can thams cad kyi don ji ltar 'dul bar byas par 'gyur ro //
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:314a-4: 'od zer de dag slar 'dus pas kyang 'jim pa
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:314a-5: nyid rin po che sna lnga'i rang bzhin du gyur
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:314a-6: nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bsam gyis mi khyab
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:314a-7: pa'i rgyu rkyen dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:314a-8: de ltar yid kyis kyang dmigs so //
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:314a-9: de nas 'bi 'bi byed pa'i cho ga rig pa chen mo 'di brjod par bya ste /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:314a-10: aom badzra a'a yu she sv'ah'a /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:314a-11: zhes lan bdun bzlas te byi gyis brlabs na /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:314a-12: 'bi 'bi nyid las ye shes kyi 'od zer gyi
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:314a-13: sprin gyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:314a-14: bar 'phros shing khyab ste 'gro ba mang po'i don
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:314a-16: 'od zer gyi sprin phung de dag slar 'bi 'bi'i
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:314a-17: nang du 'dus pas kyang de nyid ye shes rin
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:314a-18: po che'i rang bzhin shel sgong ltar yongs su dag
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:314a-19: par 'gyur ro // de bzhin du yid kyis kyang dmigs so //
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:314a-20: de nas 'bi b'i'i nang bi ma la aushn'i sha'i snying po mu dra'i phyag rgyar byas pa'am /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:314a-24: shing shun la sngags bris pa dang /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:314b-0: @314b de'i nang du rig sngags so so'i snying po dang /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:314b-2: de rnams phrugs su sbyar te mu dra'i phyag rgyar byas pa'am /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:314b-4: gang yang rung ste nang du stsal na; de bzhin
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:314b-5: gshegs pa'i thugs ye shes dang ldan par 'gyur ro
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:314b-6: // nang du stsol ba'i tshe rig sngags 'di brjod par bya'o //
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:314b-9: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ye shes de'i nang du 'dus shing zhugs par 'gyur ro //
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:314b-11: de nas tsee tya'i phor bu'i nang du yungs kar ram /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:314b-12: til mar gyis bsku ba'i sngags rig pa chen mo 'di brjod par bya'o //
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:314b-13: aom aa ra dze bi ra dze sv'ah'a /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:314b-14: zhes lan gsum bzlas shing byin gyis brlabs na /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:314b-15: de nyid thabs dang shes rab 'brel ba las chos kyi dbyings nyid kyi mchod rten du 'gyur ro //
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:314b-16: de bzhin du yid kyis kyang dmigs so //
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:314b-17: de nas mchod rten 'debs pa'i tshe rig pa chen mo 'di brjod par bya'o //
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:314b-18: aom badzra mud ga ra a'a ko ta ya a'a ko ta ya h'um phat/
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:314b-19: ces bzlas shing mchod rten btab na /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:314b-20: dbyings dang ye shes gnyis su med par 'brel ba las chos kyi sku'i mchod rten du 'gyur ro //
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:314b-21: de nas bi ma la aushn'i sha'i snying po gang nas byung bas kyang mchod rten btab na /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:315a-0: dbyings dang ye shes gnyis su med par 'brel ba las mchod kyi @315a *//
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:315a-1: sku'i mchod rten 'byams klas par 'gyur ro //
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:315a-2: de nas mchod rten phur bu'i nang nas 'byung ba'i
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:315a-3: rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'di brjod la dbyung ngo
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:315a-4: // aom dharma dh'a tu ye sv'ah'a /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:315a-6: zhes lan bdun bzlas te mchod rten byung na /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:315a-7: thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa 'brel ba
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:315a-8: las mchod rten chos kyi sku 'byams klas pa 'byung
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:315a-9: ste / 'gro ba sems can thams cad kyi don
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:315a-10: 'khor bam stongs kyi bar du phun sum tshogs par
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:315a-12: de bzhin du yid kyis kyang dmigs so //
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:315a-13: de nas mchod rten snod nas phyung ba las 'khor
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:315a-14: lo gzugs pa'i rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'di brjod
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:315a-15: par bya'o // aom bra ma na ye sv'ah'a /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:315a-16: zhes bzlas nas 'khor lo btsugs na /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:315a-19: rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:315a-20: rin po che'i shar bu dang /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:315a-21: dar gyi lhab lhub la sogs pa rnams kyis brgyan
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:315a-22: te mya ngan las 'das pa'i yon tan sna tshogs
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:315a-23: kyis brgyan te 'gro ba'i don yid bzhin du mdzad
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:315a-24: par 'gyur ro // de bzhin du yid kyis kyang dmigs so //
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:315a-25: de nas mchod rten la na bza' gsol ba'i tshe rig pa chen mo 'di bzlas la gsol to //
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:315a-26: aom dharma dha tu sv'ah'a bha ba bi shuddhe dharma te sv'ah'a /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:315b-0: zhes lan mang du @315b bzlas te btab na /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:315b-1: chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i don dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:315b-2: de nas mchod rten btab pa'i dkyil 'khor mchod rten lngar btab na /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:315b-3: dkyil 'khor yang phyogs bzhi dbus dang lngar bri bar bya'o //
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:315b-4: de bzhin du mchod rten gyi grangs brgya'am /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:315b-6: gang btab pa de'i grangs dang mchod rten gyi shong
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:315b-7: tshad kyi dkyil 'khor re'u mig rdo'i stegs bu brtsigs
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:315b-10: shing la sogs pa las dkyil 'khor gru bzhir bgyis te 'og gi khri yang seng+ge'i khri'am /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:315b-12: padma'i khri stegs su byas la /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:315b-13: de'i steng du go ma yam dang sbos chus chag
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:315b-14: chag btab ste dbus dang phyogs bzhir mchod rten bzhugs
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:315b-15: pa'i sa kun tu gur gum dang /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:315b-16: tsandan gyi chus zlum por bskus la /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:315b-17: srad bus thig btab la dkyil 'khor bri bar bya ste /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:315b-18: dkyil 'khor bri bar yang mchod rten lngar btab na /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:315b-19: dkyil 'khor gyi phyogs bzhi dbus dang lngar bri bar bya'o //
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:315b-20: de bzhin du mchod rten gyi grangs brgya'am /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:315b-21: stong gang btab pa de'i grangs kyi mchod rten shong
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:315b-22: tshad kyi dkyil 'khor re'u mig rdo rje dra ba'i
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:315b-23: thig gis sa gcad par bya'o //
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:315b-24: mchod rten gzhag pa'i sa gzhi thams cad padma 'dab ma brgyad par bri bar bya'o //
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:316a-0: de nas mchod rten gyi dkyil 'khor du bzhugs pa'i tshe rig @316a *//
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:316a-1: pa chen po'i sngags 'di brjod la bzhugs su gsol /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:316a-2: aom su pra tishtha stu be sv'ah'a /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:316a-3: zhes lan gsum bzlas te mchod rten bzhag na /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:316a-4: bdag dang gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs par spyod par 'gyur ro //
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:316a-5: de nas mchod rten dgod pa'i rim pa ni /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:316a-10: de nas byang gi bar du rim pa bzhin du dgod par bya'o //
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:316a-11: dgod pa'i tshe rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'di brjod par bya'o //
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:316a-12: aom badzra padma sa ma ye sv'h'a /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:316a-13: zhes lan gsum du bzlas la rdo rje dang /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:316a-14: padma'i gdan la bzhugs su gsol zhes byas la /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:316a-15: sa gzhi dang nam mkha'i khams dang /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:316a-16: rgya mtsho'i mjing thams cad mchod rten gyis gang bar yid kyis kyang dmigs so //
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:316a-17: gzhan yang mchod rten re re btab nas thal byung dkyil 'khor steng du bzhugs la /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:316a-19: me tog la sogs pa mchod pa rnam pa lngas mchod cing bzhugs su gsol /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:316a-20: mchod rten gyi kha dog la sogs pa bsku ba ni /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:316a-24: srung ba ljang gur dmigs te na bza' yang de
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:316a-25: bzhin du gsol la yid kyis kyang de bzhin du
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:316a-26: dmigs so // de nas mchod rten gyi dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlab par bya ste /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:316b-0: @316b dkyil 'khor gyi steng du yi ge ram dmar
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:316b-1: po gnas pa las rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'di
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:316b-4: zhes lan gsum bzlas pas de nyid ye shes kyi
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:316b-5: me dpung chen por rab tu 'bar nas gnas de
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:316b-6: dag gi rtog pa rnam par sbyangs te dkyil 'khor
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:316b-7: gyi gzhi de nyid rin po che sna lnga las
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:316b-8: grub pa'i dkyil 'khor du 'gyur ro; ;de bzhin du
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:316b-10: de nas dkyil 'khor le'u tshe lnga'am /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:316b-13: gang bris pa'i dbus rnams su yi ge aa dkar
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:316b-14: po gnas pa las rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'di
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:316b-16: aom aa tsandra mandal h'um phat/
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:316b-17: ces grangs ji tsam rnam par bzlas na /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:316b-18: mchod rten gyi gdan zla ba'i dkyil 'khor re rer 'gyur ro //
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:316b-19: de bzhin du yid kyis kyang dmigs so //
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:316b-20: de nas mchod rten gyi cho ga mdzad pa'i tshe
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:316b-21: kha shar nub gang bder bltas la bdag nyid rdo
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:316b-22: rje 'dzin pa'i sku phyag rgya chen por ting nge
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:316b-23: 'dzin gyis bsgyur te snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:316b-24: gyi steng du rdo rje rtse lnga pa ye shes
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:316b-25: kyi 'od dpung 'phro ba gnas par byas la sku
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:316b-26: dang ba spu'i gseb thams cad nas kyang ye shes
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:316b-28: sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa'i sprin phung
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:316b-29: bzhin du mthar 'byams klas par 'phros shing sems can
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:317a-1: cad du byin gyis brlabs shing don mdzad nas slar sku'i nang du thim par 'gyur te /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:317a-2: de bzhin du yid kyis kyang dmigs so //
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:317a-3: de nas mchod rten gyi gzhal yas kyang bskyed pa ni /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:317a-4: mchod rten dkyil 'khor du gzhag pa la rdo rje
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:317a-5: dbyings ma'i phyag rgya bcings nas mchod rten gyi steng
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:317a-6: du reg par byas la rig pa chen mo'i sngags
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:317a-8: aom badzra dh'a tu aa dhi tishtha h'um/
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:317a-9: zhes bzlas te byin gyis brlabs pas rin po che
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:317a-10: sna bdun gyi gzhal med khang na rin po che'i
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:317a-11: sa gzhi dang / chos kyi dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:317a-12: gyi steng na zla ba'i gdan gyi dbus na mchod
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:317a-14: de bzhin du yid kyis kyang dmigs so //
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:317a-15: de ltar du mchod rten re re btab ste bzhag
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:317a-16: nas de mchod pa'i rnam pas mchod nas seng+ge'i rgyal
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:317a-18: spyan gzigs sna tshogs dang 'dra zhing /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:317a-27: mchod pa'i rnam pa rnams pa rnam par dag par rig pa chen mo 'di brjod par bya'o //
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:317a-28: aom sarba p'u dza pushpe sv'ah'a /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:317a-29: zhes bzlas te byin gyis brlabs pas kun tu bzang
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:317a-30: po'i mchod pa'i sprin phung phun sum tshogs pas rnam
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:317b-0: @317b par 'khrigs shing char gyi rgyun bzhin du 'bab
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:317b-1: par 'gyur ro // de bzhin du yid kyis kyang dmigs so //
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:317b-2: mchod rten mchod pa rnam pa lnga po che re res mchod cing yon du dar bu chung dang /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:317b-3: 'phan la sogs pa'i bla re dang /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:317b-4: gdugs dbu chung yang rung ste /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:317b-6: de ltar cho ga bzhin du btab pa lags na /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:317b-7: dgongs pa rgyud kyi ting nge 'dzin gsal bar bya ba ni /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:317b-8: mchod rten gyi phyogs bzhi dbus dang lngar rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas sku mdog dang /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:317b-11: 'khor phun sum tshogs pa tshul bzhin du dgos te dmigs par bya'o //
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:317b-12: ye shes lnga las grub pa'i mchod rten de yang
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:317b-13: rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag cing gsal ba de
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:317b-14: dag bum pa'i dbus su bi ma la aushni sh'i
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:317b-16: rigs lnga so so'i snying po 'bru re ba kha
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:317b-17: dog gser btso ma bzhin du gdang zhing 'tsher ba
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:317b-19: de dag las ye shes kyi 'od zer na tshogs
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:317b-20: 'bams klas par rigs la phyogs bcu 'phros pa las
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:317b-21: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i sprin gyis nam mkha'i mtha'
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:317b-22: klas shing chos kyi dbyings kyi mur thug par brgyan
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:317b-23: cing grub par gyur nas 'jig rten gyi khams thams
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:317b-24: cad byin gyis brlab te 'gro ba thams cad kyi
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:317b-25: don mdzad cing re ba bskangs nas slar 'dus nas
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:318a-3: 'phrin las kyi sgrib pa la sogs pa rnam par dag ste sku dang /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:318a-5: thugs rdo rje nyid du gyur par dmigs la; dung phor gyi nang du spos chab dang /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:318a-6: dri sna tshogs sbyar ba'i aargas gsol to /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:318a-7: aarga'i phyag rgya bcings la de'i steng du dung por
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:318a-8: bzhag la spos chu'i nang du aa dkar po las
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:318a-9: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du gyur pa'i 'od zer gyi
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:318a-10: spos chu nyid ye shes kyi bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:318a-11: du gyur par dgongs shing dmigs te mchod pa dbul
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:318a-12: pa'i rig pa chen po 'di brjod par bya'o //
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:318a-13: aom aa mri te aargham pra t'itstsha sv'ah'a /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:318a-14: zhes bzlas nas dbu'i spyi bor lan gsum du bdugs shing sbrengs te phul bas /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:318a-15: 'phags pa thams cad mnyes par 'gyur ro //
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:318a-16: tshig tu yang 'phags pa thams cad mnyes par gyur cig ces kyang brjod do //
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:318a-17: de nas phyag rgya'i rgya mtsho'i sprin gyis dbu'i gtsug
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:318a-18: tu bkram ste ye shes kyi sku'i nang du 'dus
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:318a-19: shing phun sum tshogs pa'i dbang thams cad bskur bar
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:318a-20: dmigs so // de nas bi ma la aushn'i sha'i
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:318a-21: gzungs 'di bklag cing lan ci mang du brjod par
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:318a-22: byas nas bsngo ba dang smon lam rgyas par gdab
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:318a-23: dmigs so // par bya'o // cho ga 'di bzhin
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:318a-24: du rdzogs par bya ba mi bden rang gi lha
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:318a-25: nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis skur bsgyur ba las
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:318b-0: dgongs @318b pa ma nyams par bya ste /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:318b-2: mchod pa'i yo byad la sogs pa thams cad rang
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:318b-3: bzhin gyis chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag par dgongs
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:318b-4: te mchod rten btab na yang cho ga rgyas par
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:318b-7: de bzhin du ma gyur na /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:318b-8: yang bi ma la aushn'i sha'i gzungs 'di klog pa dang /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:318b-10: yi ger 'bri zhing 'chang bas mchod rten btab na /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:318b-11: cho ga rgyas par mdzad pa nyid 'di yin te /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:318b-12: mchod rten de bzhin gshegs pa'i skur bsgyur nas bdag
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:318b-13: dang gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs par byed par
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:318b-14: 'gyur ro // bi ma la aushn'i sha'i gzungs 'di ma brjod na /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:318b-15: mchod pa phul zhing mnga' gsol yang mnga' phul bar mi 'gyur ro //
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:318b-16: gzhung las kyang 'di skad ces 'byung ngo //
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:318b-17: rig sngags gsang sngags thams cad kyi //
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:318b-18: sngags kyi rang bzhin mi gsal zhing //
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:318b-19: dgongs pa'i ting nge 'dzin mi gsal bas //
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:318b-20: mchod rten la sogs sku gzugs rnams //
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:318b-21: brlabs kyang rdzogs par yongs mi 'gyur //
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:318b-23: gang zhig gsang sngags dang dgongs par ldan pas mchod rten dang /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:318b-24: sku gzugs btab pa'i yon tan ni /
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:318b-27: bsod nams bgyis pa'i khyad par ni //
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:318b-28: gzungs 'di bzlas pa'i mchod rten gyis //
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:318b-29: gcig btab bye ba btab dang 'dra //
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:319a-1: yis; ;mtshams med lnga dang sdig dpung rnams //
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:319a-2: ji snyed yod pa ma lus 'byang //
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:319a-3: tshe ring phun sum tshogs par 'gyur //
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:319a-4: tshe rabs gzhan du skyes nas kyang //
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:319a-5: rigs mchog dam par skyes nas kyang //
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:319a-6: longs spyod mchog dang rab ldan zhing //
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:319a-7: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por bskyes //
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:319a-8: tshe rabs snga phyi dran par 'gyur //
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:319a-9: dus gsum 'jig rten thams cad du //
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:319a-10: dkon mchog gsum dang mi 'bral zhing //
K12D0601=D0884_H0557:319a-11: bgegs dang gnod pas de mi bskyod //
